meanings.definition: Able to last a long time without deteriorating.
meanings.sent1: The sturdy table was made of durables materials that would not easily break.
meanings.sent2: The durable shoes lasted for many years without falling apart.
meanings.sent3: The durable umbrella refused to give up even in the strongest storm.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship was as durable as a diamond, never fading or breaking.
meanings.sent5: The durable fortress stood strong against all attacks, never yielding.

meanings.definition: Goods that are not consumed or used up quickly and can be used repeatedly.
meanings.sent1: The store specialized in selling durables like furniture and electronics.
meanings.sent2: She invested in durables such as kitchen appliances that would last a lifetime.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his socks were so durable, they had been around since the dinosaurs.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was a durable good, always there when she needed it.
meanings.sent5: The durable backpack carried all her belongings without wearing out.
